news.title: 巨星陨落，枪击惨案，爱泼斯坦余震
《恋爱时代》男星詹姆斯·范德比克因肠癌去世，享年48岁
news.title0: Dawson's Creek star James Van Der Beek dies aged 48
news.content: 美国青春剧《恋爱时代》主演詹姆斯·范德比克因肠癌去世，享年48岁。他于2024年11月公开诊断结果，此前已与病魔抗争一段时间。
news.content0: Actor James Van Der Beek, best known for his starring role in US teen drama Dawson's Creek, has died aged 48 after being diagnosed with bowel cancer.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大校园枪击致九死二十五伤，嫌犯系18岁女性
news.title0: Live Updates: Police Identify Suspect in Mass Shooting in Canada
news.content: 加拿大不列颠哥伦比亚省发生校园枪击案，一名18岁女性枪手杀害其母、继兄及六名师生后自杀，共致九人死亡，二十五人受伤。
news.content0: The 18-year-old fatally shot her mother and stepbrother as well as six people at a school, before killing herself. Her motive was unclear, but police had visited her home several times for mental health issues.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 特朗普被指2006年已知晓爱泼斯坦恶行
news.title0: Ex-police chief said Trump told him in 2006 'everyone' knew of Epstein's behaviour
news.content: 据FBI文件，前佛州警长称特朗普2006年致电他时表示“每个人”都知道爱泼斯坦的恶行，并称已将其赶出俱乐部。特朗普方面否认知情。
news.content0: A former Florida police chief said he received a call from Donald Trump in 2006 in which the now-president told him "everyone" knows about Jeffrey Epstein’s behaviour, according to an FBI document released by the justice department.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 安德鲁王子被指向爱泼斯坦发送涉阿富汗矿产机密简报
news.title0: Brief sent by Andrew to Epstein included gold investments, file seen by BBC suggests
news.content: BBC所见文件显示，安德鲁王子曾向爱泼斯坦发送一份涉阿富汗黄金、铀等矿产投资机会的机密政府简报。警方正评估是否调查其渎职行为。
news.content0: A document apparently sent by Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor to Jeffrey Epstein included information on investment opportunities in gold and uranium in Afghanistan.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 曼联老板称英国“被移民殖民”，首相要求道歉
news.title0: 'UK has been colonised by immigrants', says INEOS boss and Man Utd co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe
news.content: 曼联联合老板、亿万富翁吉姆·拉特克利夫爵士称英国“被移民殖民”，引发争议。英国首相斯塔默谴责其言论“冒犯且错误”，并要求其道歉。
news.content0: Britain has been "colonised" by immigrants, who are draining resources from the state, Sir Jim Ratcliffe, one of the country's richest and most influential men, has told Sky News.
news.author: Sky News

news.title: 伊朗纪念革命周年，美军舰集结海湾施压
news.title0: Iran Commemorates Revolution, With U.S. Warships Lurking Off the Coast
news.content: 伊朗举行大规模集会纪念1979年伊斯兰革命周年。与此同时，特朗普派遣的美国军舰舰队在波斯湾水域集结，对伊核谈判施压。
news.content0: Iran’s government on Wednesday marked the anniversary of the 1979 Islamic Revolution with mass rallies across the country, a show of defiance at a time when precariousnuclear negotiations with Washingtoncould give way to another regional war.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 瑞士将公投决定是否设1000万人口上限以限制移民
news.title0: Switzerland to Vote on Capping Population at 10 Million
news.content: 瑞士将于6月举行全民公投，决定是否在2050年前将人口上限设定为1000万，并通过限制移民来实现。此举凸显欧洲反移民情绪加剧。
news.content0: Switzerland will hold a referendum in June on whether to cap its population at 10 million until 2050 by limiting immigration, sharply illustrating how anti-foreigner sentiment in Europe has hardened since the continent’s migration crisis a decade ago.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 美国21岁速滑天才斯托尔茨破奥运纪录夺金
news.title0: Jordan Stolz finds a new gear to break an Olympic record.
news.content: 21岁的美国速滑选手乔丹·斯托尔茨在米兰-科尔蒂纳冬奥会男子1000米比赛中轻松夺金，并创造了新的奥运纪录，打破了荷兰在该项目的长期统治。
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 巴基斯坦女律师就“月经税”起诉政府，挑战健康禁忌
news.title0: A young lawyer is taking Pakistan’s government to court over ‘period tax.’ She hopes the case will break sexual health taboos
news.content: 巴基斯坦年轻律师马赫努尔·奥马尔就卫生巾等女性卫生产品征收“月经税”起诉政府，希望此案能打破社会对性健康话题的禁忌。
news.content0: For years, Mahnoor Omer didn’t talk about it.
news.author: CNN
